prerequisite: YLS1201 Beginning Spanish 1 and YLS1202 Beginning Spanish 2 or permission from instructor. A placement exam may be required.
moduleDescription: This module targets students who have completed the introductory Spanish sequence or have had significant experience with the language (e.g., Study Abroad during their first summer at Yale-NUS). It offers a combination of listening and speaking practice with a review of key concepts of Spanish grammar. This module continues to incorporate Hispanic cultural elements and representative texts from the Spanish-speaking world.
